Source.Name: typst
Source.Summary: A new markup-based typesetting system that is powerful and easy to learn
Source.Description: Typst is a new markup-based typesetting system that is designed to be as powerful as LaTeX while being much easier to learn and use.

Package.Name: typst
Package.Summary: A new markup-based typesetting system that is powerful and easy to learn
Package.Description: Typst is a new markup-based typesetting system that is designed to be as powerful as LaTeX while being much easier to learn and use.
